I love the feeling of the ocean water on my skin when I'm snorkeling.
I want to learn how to express my emotions more effectively in romantic relationships.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.

My wife doesn't like me anymore, but at least I'm getting used to my new beard.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
I'm not a morning person, but I love going hiking with my friends.
My favorite thing about my job is the free cupcakes.

content.text: Hello! I'm a teacher in training. What do you do for a living?
I work on Wall Street, but my wife doesn't like me anymore. What's your favorite part about your job?
I'm not sure yet! I'm still in training, but I'm excited to start teaching kids.
That sounds awesome! I love kids. I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
That's great! What's your favorite song?
Oh man, there are so many good ones. I love "Angel of Death" by Slayer.
That's a good one! I love the heavy guitars.
I know, right? It's so badass.
I'm not really a morning person, but I love going hiking with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm not a morning person either, but I love the outdoors.
Me too! I love being in nature.
Me too! It's so peaceful and relaxing.
I'm glad we have some things in common!
